caption:
‘FOUR CROWNS’ Frames for RIYADH SEASON’S Arthur Beterbiev (@arturbeterbiev) VS Dmitry Bivol (@bivol_d) fight!

FULL FILM LINK IN BIO. 

Massive thanks to @untold_studios @ballad.co @davidgesslbauer and @ryantaubert who put so much time and effort into the last stages of edit, post, sound etc to bring this one home.
